description:
Learn a practical and quick scheme to plan, create and publish professional websites without knowledge development, with great flexibility and security. Very useful for designing new business or even tips for experienced bloggers.

Wordpress is the CRM (Content Resource Management) most popular in the world, and the best: a free software (GPL). It is a mandatory knowledge for professionals in all areas.

Some the topics of this training :

Planning your new site / business

Choose the Best Hosting / Domain

Perform Wordpress deploy

Customize according to the needs

Marketing for your new site

Extending functionality with plugins
title: Professional Easy HTML5 Site with Wordpress
